# Introduction

The goal of this pdf document is threefold. First it aims at getting a handle on the data. Second it explains how I built the database. Lastly I define each variable. 

# Get a handle on my data

First, let me import my database.For this I use the `read.table` function from the `utils` package  [@HenrikBengtsson2017]. 

```{r}
library(utils)
DataBase<-data.frame(read.table("DataBase_26032018.csv", sep = ";", header = TRUE ))
```

The `dim` function shows that the database contains `r nrow(DataBase)` rows and `r ncol(DataBase)` variables.

```{r}
dim(DataBase)
```

Let's have a closer look on the database in using the `names` and `head` function.

```{r}
names(DataBase)
head(DataBase)
```
